persona.name: Isabella Rodriguez
persona.learned_tendency: Isabella Rodriguez is a cafe owner of Hobbs Cafe who loves to make people feel welcome. She is always looking for ways to make the cafe a place where people can come to relax and enjoy themselves.
persona.current_situation: Isabella is planning a Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe on February 14th. She is gathering materials and inviting everyone she meets.
persona.lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 6am.

schedule.environment_description: soft hum of the refrigerator, distant street lamp glow through curtains, rhythmic breathing, cool bedsheets
schedule.notes: Deep sleep before a busy day of party planning.

schedule.environment_description: steam from the shower, scent of lavender soap, buzzing electric toothbrush, phone screen glowing with new emails
schedule.notes: Isabella feels energized and ready to start the day.

schedule.notes: Opening the cafe and greeting the first wave of customers.

schedule.environment_description: clatter of silverware, aroma of toasted sandwiches, laughter from a nearby table, constant email pings on her phone
schedule.notes: Enjoying a social lunch while discussing party plans with friends.

schedule.environment_description: crinkle of red crepe paper, scent of fresh roses, buzzing phone notifications, distant sound of a delivery truck
schedule.notes: Assessing the cafe space to determine what decorations are still needed.

schedule.environment_description: squeaky shopping cart wheel, bright fluorescent lights, background music over speakers, phone vibrating with party RSVPs
schedule.notes: Purchasing final supplies and inviting Tom to the party.

schedule.environment_description: sound of tape being pulled, rustle of streamers, soft jazz playing in the cafe, phone screen lighting up with emails
schedule.notes: Finishing the primary decorations for the Valentine's event.

schedule.environment_description: soft glow of the television, warmth of a tea mug, distant siren outside, phone notifications muted on the coffee table
schedule.notes: Winding down after a productive day of work and planning.

schedule.environment_description: running water in the sink, scent of night cream, soft towel texture, phone screen dimming on the counter
schedule.notes: Preparing for bed to ensure a full night's rest.

schedule.environment_description: silence of the house, cool air from the vent, weight of the duvet, phone charging on the nightstand
schedule.notes: Falling asleep quickly after a long day.
